name: Soirney
description:
Soirney is a 2D games taking over the aesthetics of the je Journey,

Live a formidable adventure in a ravaged world where you are the only survivor of your species after a strange white creature called "Tunic" has given you back your life.

Explored this long desert in search of your inner peace to free your friends forever frozen in stone for too long

With the help of Reidy a red "Tunic" will manage to defeat all the eagles and progeny confronting each other on your way..
